resources.string: "If you would like to manage your external storage from PC, you must grant permission."
"Start the service to connect your mobile device to PC."
"Key in this address to the browser on your PC:"
"Connect your device to the same Wi-Fi network"
"You'll not be able to write to external storage without proper permission. Continue?"
"HTTP file server will be closed and operations may be interrupted. Continue?"
"You have added %1$s large files. View them now."
"Your recent files consume %1$s space. View them now."
"The World's most trusted Android Optimizer, Speed Booster, Battery Saver and Free Anti-Virus app. \nDownload now?"
